column1: The Wil Wheaton Project, el nuevo programa del canal SyFy.

Dentro de las cadenas de cable es cada vez más habitual que, además de las series, tengan sus propios talk-shows que hablen sobre sus series en emisión (Talking-Dead-AMC) o programas que traten alguna temática relacionada con el canal (Face-off, Jim Henson’s Creature Shop-Syfy). Dentro de esta tendencia sobresale la cadena SyFy, un canal temático que dentro de sus propuestas lleva ya varios años…

Definitely amped to check out ‘The Wil Wheaton Project’ w/ @wilw on @syfyTV

Wil Wheaton has a new show on SyFy:
The show will be on the network formerly known as Sci-Fi, and it is called The Wil Wheaton Project. It premieres on May 27th at 10pm.

The Wil Wheaton Project is a weekly roundup of the things I love on television and on the Internet, with commentary and jokes, and the occasional visit from interesting people who make those things happen. It’s sort of like Talk…
Syfy has greenlit the 12-episode summer series, The Wil Wheaton Project (working title), which is set to premiere May 27 at 10 p.m. on the network.

The series is a weekly topical comedy show hosted by actor, blogger and champion of geek culture Wil Wheaton. The 30-minute show will offer a fast-paced, lighthearted exploration and celebration of all things within the realm of science fiction and…

Nerdgasm Ahoy: Wil Wheaton To Host Syfy’s “Talk Soup For Geeks”

Photo courtesy of The Hollywood Report
Wil Wheaton has a new project with Syfy that sounds exactly up my alley.
On Wednesday, the Star Trek: The Next Generation alum, fave Big Bang Theory guest star, and geek god announced that he has developed a new show with Syfy called The Wil Wheaton Project.
